title: Any way to mute enemy voicelines?
body: Title says it all. Would like to know if it was possible to mute enemy voice lines but keep your own. Just went against a yuumi and i swear she was saying the most cringy lines ever.

replies.body:
You can turn the Voice-sound to 0 

sadly every champion will be muted lol
I'm surprised you haven't mentioned Neeko, she is the only enemy champ I sometimes want to mute, with how she yells everytime she uses one of her abilities.
That is part of her kit, no cheating!
